title: The Painted men
brief_description: Filmed in and around Hanuabada village, Port Moresby, this story of the abduction of a native girl by ”painted men” and her rescue by her lover was made for the entertainment of local audiences. It is claimed to be the first Papua New Guinean film with an indigenous cast.
